title: THE BEST!!
review: Scarface is the best movie ever made! There will never be another movie like it. This movie alone makes Pacino the best actor EVER! Regardless. Tell me who is a better actor and why. The reason that Scarface is the best movie ever is that it represents a realness of life for someone like Tony Montana at that time. It is a story of the little man building himself up to be the big man. *SPOILER*Tony's death expresses the realism of his life choices. The question is: Are we supposed to feel for Tony or look at him as 'the bad guy' that got what was coming to him?
